author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie John Long writes that he regrets &c but if I send him 1½ guineas he will send me an exhaustive report on the book, written by a novelist of good standing, which would be of use to me, he says, in showing me something or other. If the report showed that my book ‘possessed merit’ he would reconsider his decision. Advise. I rely on you for Monday: otherwise arsed. Jim
